Weakness Abroad:
The botched withdraw from Afghanistan decimated our credibility from Iran to China. Exhibit A: Russia is set to invade Ukraine & yesterday the President said he can‚Äôt even get NATO to support sanctions if Putin decides to bite off another chunk of his neighbor.

Biden‚Äôs Border Crisis:
Border security is national security. A weakened border has led to a surge in illegal immigration, as 1.7M people were apprehended at our southern border last year. Worse, drug cartels are flooding the U.S. w/ unthinkable amounts of fentanyl & deadly drugs.

Instead of working to keep inflation at bay, the Biden Administration & their cohorts continue to push for more out-of-control government spending, which will only drive inflation to even higher levels.

Economic Crisis:
Inflation is taxation. 2021 was the worst year for #inflation since 1981. At 7%, the inflation rate continues to rise, as Americans are making less & paying more for everything. Making things worse, the #supplychaincrisis keeps shelves empty & demand even higher.

¬†God bless each of you, and God Bless America!

And we‚Äôd never forget the thousands of brave men and women who would fight the War on Terror to keep us safe.
